profile.rationale: The job advertisement consists solely of the title "Senior Go Engineer". It provides no descriptive text regarding job tasks, responsibilities, or required skills. According to the `CODING_BOOK.md`, the `Not Relevant` profile is assigned when "The job ad shows no significant tasks from A or B." As no tasks are described, this profile is the most appropriate classification.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is extremely minimal, containing only a job title. There is no descriptive content from which to extract job tasks, technologies (beyond "Go"), or soft skills. This lack of information makes it impossible to perform a meaningful analysis or confidently assign any of the defined profiles, as the core criteria (job tasks) are entirely absent.
